AT.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead
AT.description: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead ist ein Spiel, bei dem Deine Reflexe auf die Probe gestellt werden. Du musst den Plan einer außerirdischen Invasion, der die Eroberung des Planeten vom Untergrund aus vorsieht, zunichtemachen. Kannst Du die Außerirdischen besiegen und den Planeten retten? Um sie zu vernichten, musst Du mit Deinem Hammer auf die Aliens einschlagen, sobald sie aus den Löchern hervorkommen. Aber pass auf – Du musst schnell sein, denn wenn sie Dich entdecken, werden sie sich auf Dich stürzen und Dich beißen. Entdecke den Klassiker Whack-A-Mole neu: Jetzt zusätzlich mit vielen verschiedenen Events und Extras wie Stein-Schere-Papier-Wettkämpfen, Power-Ups und vielem mehr. Mutant Alien Moles wird so zu einer Herausforderung für Groß und Klein. Bist Du bereit? Spieleigenschaften: - Touch-Steuerung - Power-Ups - Eine farbenprächtige, coole Welt - Endgegner in den einzelnen Spielabschnitten - Stein-Schere-Papier-Wettkämpfe - Plattform-Spielabschnitte im Stil von Game & Watch - Ein geheimes Level für erfahrene Spieler.

movies.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead - Trailer

AU.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead
AU.description: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead is a game of reflexes in which your mission is to foil the plans of an alien invader that is attempting to conquer the planet from underground. Can you defeat the aliens and save the planet? To do that, you’ll have to whack the aliens with your hammer as soon as they pop up through the holes. But be careful! You’ll have to be quick, because as soon as they see you, they’ll pounce and try to bite you! Rediscover the classic Whack-A-Mole with the added diversity of events and extras, such as rock-paper-scissors battles, power ups and much more, making Mutant Alien Moles a challenge for both young and old. Are you ready? Features: - Fully tactile - Power-ups - A colorful, carefree world - Stage bosses - Rock-paper-scissors battles - Game & Watch style platform stage - A secret level for more experienced players.

movies.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead - Trailer

You’ll have to be quick, because as soon as they see you, they’ll pounce and try to bite you! Are you ready? Features: - Fully tactile - Power-ups - A colorful, carefree world - Stage bosses - Rock-paper-scissors battles - Game & Watch style platform stage - A secret level for more experienced players.

movies.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead - Trailer

BE.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead
BE.description: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead est un jeu de réflexes dans lequel tu dois neutraliser les plans d’une invasion extraterrestre dont l’objectif est de conquérir la planète depuis le sous-sol. Seras-tu capable de vaincre les aliens et de sauver la planète ? Pour cela, tu devras assener des coups de marteau aux aliens dès le moment où ils surgissent des trous. Mais attention, tu dois agir rapidement. En effet, dès qu’ils te verront, ils se jetteront sur toi pour te mordre ! Redécouvre le jeu classique Whack-A-Mole (Jeu de la taupe) auquel on a ajouté toute une série d’événements et de fonctionnalités extras comme les duels « pierre-feuilles-ciseaux », des power-ups et bien d’autres fonctionnalités qui feront de Mutant Alien Moles un véritable défi tant pour les grands que pour les petits. Tu es prêt ? Caractéristiques : - Complètement tactile - Power-ups - Univers aux couleurs vives et gaies - Chefs de phase - Duels « pierre-feuilles-ciseaux » - Phase de plates-formes de style Game & Watch - Un niveau secret pour les plus courageux.

movies.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead - bande-annonce

ES.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead
ES.description: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead es un juego de reflejos en el que debes desbaratar los planes de una intrusión alienígena que pretende conquistar el planeta desde el subsuelo. ¿Serás capaz de derrotar a los aliens y salvar el planeta? Para ello deberás atizar a los aliens con tu martillo en cuanto aparezcan por los agujeros. Pero cuidado, tienes que hacerlo rápido porque en cuanto te vean se abalanzarán sobre ti para morderte! Redescubre el clásico Whack-A-Mole al que se le han añadidos diversidad de eventos y extras como enfrentamientos a piedra papel tijera, power ups y mucho más, que harán de Mutant Alien Moles un reto para grandes y pequeños. Estas preparado? Características: - Totalmente táctil - Power-ups - Mundo colorido y desenfadado - Jefes de fase - Enfrentamientos a piedra papel y tijera - Fase de plataformas con estilo Game & Watch - Un nivel secreto para los más aguerridos.

movies.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead - Trailer

IT.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead
IT.description: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead è un gioco di riflessi nel quale devi intralciare i piani di una intrusione di alieni che vogliono conquistare il pianeta dal sottosuolo. Riuscirai a sconfiggere gli alieni e a salvare il pianeta? Per far ciò dovrai colpire gli alieni con il tuo martello quando spuntano dalle buche. Ma attenzione, devi farlo velocemente perché non appena ti vedono si lanciano su di te per morderti! Riscopri il classico Whack-A-Mole (Acchiappa la talpa) al quale sono stati aggiunti tanti eventi ed extra come combattimenti a sasso-carta-forbice, i power-up e molto altro ancora, che faranno di Mutant Alien Moles una sfida per grandi e piccini. Sei pronto? Caratteristiche: - Completamente touch - Power-up - Mondo colorato e rasserenato - Capi fase - Combattimenti a sasso-carta-forbici - Fase delle piattaforme elegante Game & Watch - Un livello segreto per i più agguerriti.

RU.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead
RU.description: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead is a game of reflexes in which your mission is to foil the plans of an alien invader that is attempting to conquer the planet from underground. Can you defeat the aliens and save the planet? To do that, you’ll have to whack the aliens with your hammer as soon as they pop up through the holes. But be careful! You’ll have to be quick, because as soon as they see you, they’ll pounce and try to bite you! Rediscover the classic Whack-A-Mole with the added diversity of events and extras, such as rock-paper-scissors battles, power ups and much more, making Mutant Alien Moles a challenge for both young and old. Are you ready? Features: - Fully tactile - Power-ups - A colorful, carefree world - Stage bosses - Rock-paper-scissors battles - Game & Watch style platform stage - A secret level for more experienced players.

movies.name: Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead - трейлер
